title: Person of interest (All in) Lou's casino winning streak (Eng subs)
author: Manos Nomidis
comment: The computer is like, there's 51% chance of winning. Lou just go on with his god like slight of hand and win every round
pretty lame scene, typical Hollywood BS
description:
A scene of justice from Season 2 Episode 18 , where Lou decides to take every dime lost due to Makris . Harold plays his part too ^^ 

Song played : 'All in' , Composed by Ramin Djawadi
